General.Name: Shanghai Guangdian Electric Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Guangdian Electric Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells complete sets of equipment, power electronics, and components in China. The company provides power electronic products, such as medium-voltage and low-voltage switchgear, high-voltage starting and low-voltage starting cabinet, intelligent precision power distribution cabinet, intelligent AC medium-voltage switchgear, marine AC low-voltage switchgear, box-type fixed AC and DC switchgear, gas-insulated ring network cabinet, dry-type power transformer, power and control cabinet, lighting box, low-voltage complete reactive power compensation device, active power filter devices, and high-voltage frequency conversion speed control devices. It also offers component products, including medium and low-voltage contactors and circuit breakers, intelligent control components, power automatic transfer switch, charging pile, surge protector, and reactive power compensation device. It offers its products under the SGEG, Honeywell, and AEG brands in electric power, petroleum, chemical, metallurgy, municipal construction, construction, environmental protection, and other fields industries. Shanghai Guangdian Electric Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Shanghai, China.
